name: Math Hero - Minimalist Puzzle
description:
Welcome to Math Hero!


MATH HERO is a relaxing puzzle game with simple mechanics.
Train your brain and test your memory in levels with increasing complexity.

The game consists of performing addition and subtraction operations to reach the end point.

Featuring:
  • Only one solution per level;
  • 50 hand-crafted levels with increasing complexity;
  • Solve puzzles, earn points and compete in the global ranking;
  • Calm music to help you focus and relax while solving the puzzles;
